Articles.Content:
This is not the topic you are looking for.

/jedi

DISCUSS AND VOTE. :3c

EDIT: Conversation starter; Qui-Gon or Obi-Wan?
obi-wan taut luke skywaker(that saver of the galaxy)

but:

old saying time!

*'the porpus of a teacher is to make thear pupal* ***BETTER*** *than them'*

Seeing as how they\'re all based off the Mandalorian armours... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

As far as the question goes; Yoda. /endthread

> 
> nope
> 
> Qui-Gon da boss

[I can\'t even begin to describe what Obi-Wan Kenobi has achieved.](http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi)

Obi-Wan was a lightpoint and a hero throughout the movies and in several games. Your little hero Qui-Gon is little more than a side-character to the \'\'newer\'\' Star Wars movies. I\'m sorry, that\'s just the way it is.

![dealwithit.gif](http://i461.photobucket.com/albums/qq333/Ascensiam/dealwithit.gif)
Qui-Gon trained Obi-Wan to do all that, y\'know, he... err, just wasn\'t up to it. Yeah.

> 
> Qui-Gon trained Obi-Wan to do all that, y\'know, he... err, just wasn\'t up to it. Yeah.

Actually i have to agree with popeter on this one, if you read the article on Obi-Wan, you\'ll see all of the adventures and achievements he made with them, he is vastly self-learned, and do note that he actually wasn\'t a padawan of Qui-Gon for very long.

I just have to share this:

[http://www.starwars.com/news/1313_announce.html](http://www.starwars.com/news/1313_announce.html)

After all this: New Trilogy, Clone Wars, Lego Star Wars etc. we will get a Star Wars game for adults again! I can\'t express how happy I am as I saw Star Wars turning into a topic that focused more and more on children and not on the older fans.

> 
> I just have to share this:
> 
> [http://www.starwars.com/news/1313_announce.html](http://www.starwars.com/news/1313_announce.html)
> 
> After all this: New Trilogy, Clone Wars, Lego Star Wars etc. we will get a Star Wars game for adults again! I can\'t express how happy I am as I saw Star Wars turning into a topic that focused more and more on children and not on the older fans.

Hey, hey, hey! ;D

Looks nice, though I need to see more to judge this thing.

I don\'t see why you have taken the new trilogy as an example for Star Wars turning into a topic for children. It was much darker and more serious then the old one.

If you want to see some real adut Star Wars stuff look at this book: [http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Death_Troopers](http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Death_Troopers)

Here\'s a little trailer to it: [Star Wars: Death Troopers Trailer Alternate Ending](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CaoNQ4yVdUI#ws)
